title: 2 Easy Ways to Cancel Discord Nitro or Nitro Basic

steps.title: Launch the Discord desktop app.
steps.content: Launch the Discord desktop app. Discord is available to download on Windows, Mac , and Linux. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now. You can also use Discord in a desktop browser at https://discord.com/ . Use this method only if you signed up for Nitro using the desktop app. If you have a Nitro free trial, be sure to cancel it before the trial ends to avoid any fees, as it will auto-renew.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. You can find this at the bottom-left corner, next to your Discord ID. [1] X Research source The User Settings page will open.

steps.title: Click Subscriptions.
steps.content: Click Subscriptions . This will be underneath the Billing Settings header. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Click Cancel.
steps.content: Click Cancel . You can find this in the colored Nitro banner, next to Switch Plans . [3] X Research source A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . You may need to scroll to find this button. Discord Nitro will be cancelled. At the end of your billing period, you'll lose access to perks such as higher screen share quality when streaming movies or sharing gameplay with friends, larger upload sizes , and more. However, you can resubscribe to Nitro at any time.

steps.title: Open the Discord app.
steps.content: Open the Discord app. This looks like Discord's mascot, Wumpus, with a blue-purple background. Discord is available for iOS and Android. Use this method if you signed up for Discord Nitro through Apple's App Store or Android's Google Play Store. If you have a Nitro free trial, be sure to cancel it before the trial ends to avoid any fees, as it will auto-renew.

steps.title: Tap ☰ in the top-right corner.
steps.content: Tap ☰ in the top-right corner. You can also swipe right to open the menu.

steps.title: Tap your user icon.
steps.content: Tap your user icon. This will be in the bottom-right corner. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Manage Nitro.
steps.content: Tap Manage Nitro . You can find this underneath the Billing Settings header. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Cancel.
steps.content: Tap Cancel . You can find this in the colored Nitro banner, next to Switch Plans . [6] X Research source A pop-up window will open.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . You may need to scroll to find this button. You'll be taken to your device's Subscriptions page.

steps.title: Tap Discord.
steps.content: Tap Discord . This will be listed in your active subscriptions.

steps.title: Tap Cancel Subscription.
steps.content: Tap Cancel Subscription . You may need to confirm. [7] X Research source Discord Nitro will be cancelled.
